title: SQL UPDATE Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of SQL UPDATE statements.
instructions: Which SQL statement correctly updates the email of the user with id=3?
options: UPDATE users SET email='new@mail.com' WHERE id=3;
MODIFY users SET email='new@mail.com' WHERE id=3;
INSERT INTO users email='new@mail.com' WHERE id=3;
SET email='new@mail.com' IN users WHERE id=3;
correct_answer: UPDATE users SET email='new@mail.com' WHERE id=3;
hints: UPDATE is the DML command for modifying rows
Always use WHERE to target specific rows
